TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataControlExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DataControlExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

span.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 클래스는 ASP.NET 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에서 Dynamic Data 기능을 사용 하는 데 사용 됩니다.The class is used to enable Dynamic Data features in ASP.NET data-bound controls. ## Examples 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에서 Dynamic Data 기능을 사용 하는 방법의 예제를 보려면 [연습: ASP.NET 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에 동적 데이터를 사용 하도록 설정](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f)합니다.For an example of how to enable Dynamic Data features in a data-bound control, see [Walkthrough: Enabling Dynamic Data in ASP.NET Data-Bound Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f).

summary.span: Enables Dynamic Data behavior for the specified data control.

span.span: Enables Dynamic Data behavior for the specified data control.
